import React, { useEffect, useState,useContext } from 'react' import {LoginContext} from '../context' import axios from 'axios' import {baseUrl} from '../context' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Students from './student/allstudentsSub' function teacherMainPage() { const {User} = useContext(LoginContext) const [state, setstate] = useState(User.user.category) const [studentCount, setstudentCount] = useState(null) console.log(User); const [cat, setcat] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { setstate(User.user.category) axios.get(baseUrl + '/student/getStudents/'+state).then((res) => { setcat(res.data); console.log(cat); }); axios.get(baseUrl + '/student/getStudentCount').then((res) => { setstudentCount(res.data); }); }, [state]) return (
